title: Add admin-controlled marquee text banner with multiple messages

requirements.text: Add backend storage and API methods for managing marquee banner messages, including fields for message text, display order, and enabled status. Support CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete) for banner messages.

quotes: admin should be able to add multiple message

acceptanceCriteria: Backend stores banner messages with text, order, and enabled status
API methods allow creating, reading, updating, and deleting banner messages
Messages can be reordered by updating their display order value
Only enabled messages are returned to the frontend

requirements.text: Restrict banner message management API methods to only the admin user with email 'aureliefinejewellery06@gmail.com'. Use the existing admin authorization pattern from the codebase.

quotes: only for the admin control with login ID aureliefinejewellery06@gmail.com

acceptanceCriteria: Banner message mutations require admin authorization
Only the specified email address can manage banner messages
Unauthorized attempts return appropriate error responses

requirements.text: Create a MarqueeBanner component that displays below the header in a static position (not fixed/sticky). The banner should smoothly scroll enabled messages horizontally in a continuous loop with a gold/beige luxury theme matching the existing brand styling.

quotes: below the header and remain static in location
Smooth horizontal scrolling with gold/beige luxury styling

acceptanceCriteria: Banner appears below the header on all pages
Messages scroll horizontally in a smooth, continuous marquee effect
Banner uses gold/beige colors consistent with the Aurelie brand
Banner position is static (scrolls with page content, not fixed)
Multiple messages display in sequence within the scrolling marquee

requirements.text: Add banner message management interface to the admin dashboard with functionality to add, edit, delete, and reorder multiple banner messages. Include controls for enabling/disabling individual messages.

quotes: admin should be able to add multiple message
Add, edit, delete, and reorder multiple messages

acceptanceCriteria: Admin dashboard includes a new tab or section for banner management
Interface allows adding new banner messages with text input
Existing messages can be edited or deleted
Messages can be reordered using drag-and-drop or up/down controls
Each message has an enable/disable toggle
Only enabled messages appear in the public marquee banner

requirements.text: Integrate the MarqueeBanner component into the Layout component so it appears below the header across all pages of the site.

quotes: below the header and remain static in location

acceptanceCriteria: Banner renders in Layout component after the header
Banner appears on all customer-facing and admin pages
Banner fetches and displays enabled messages from the backend

constraints: Only the admin user with email 'aureliefinejewellery06@gmail.com' can manage banner messages
Banner must use gold/beige luxury theme matching existing Aurelie brand styling
Banner position must be static (not fixed/sticky) and appear below the header
nonGoals: Animated transitions between individual messages (continuous scroll only)
Scheduled banner messages or time-based display
A/B testing or analytics for banner messages
Rich text formatting or HTML in banner messages
